txt.en: Salamanders, rock-worms, and fire-drakes can be found throughout Talath Úrui.
Tancram is in the Hall of the King.
Defeat salamanders or rock-worms in Talath Úrui ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated salamanders or rock-worms in Talath Úrui ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You have defeated some of the dragon-kind in Talath Úrui? I am pleased to hear it, and offer you this reward from the Kingdom of Gondor in acknowledgement of the service you have provided.\n\n'Come back tomorrow for more work, my friend.'
Talk to Tancram in the Hall of the King

'Defeat salamanders and rock-worms in Talath Úrui, or hunt for the more dangerous fire-drakes that walk the scorching plains. I leave the decision up to you, for facing either of these will aid the Kingdom of Gondor.'
Tancram has asked you to defeat some of the dragon-kind that stalk Talath Úrui.

'Many are the dangerous foes that stalk the burning plains of Talath Úrui, but none are so threatening as the creatures of dragon-kind. Defeat salamanders and rock-worms, or hunt for the more dangerous fire-drakes that walk the scorching plains. I leave the decision up to you, for facing either of these will aid the Kingdom of Gondor.\n\n'Good luck to you, [placeholder].'
